title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 777/1999 of 15 April 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 2486/98 introducing preventive distillation as provided for in Article 38 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 822/87 for the 1998/99 wine year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 777/1999
of 15 April 1999
amending Regulation (EC) No 2486/98 introducing preventive distillation as provided for in Article 38 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 822/87 for the 1998/99 wine year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the first subparagraph of Article 1(6) of Regulation (EC) No 2486/98, "12 March 1999" is replaced by "22 March 1999".

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
